title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Intelligent Tutoring System-Based Science Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and proficiency in digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three collaborative learning design models based on intelligent tutoring systems using IMS-LD
